com.github.sbaudoin.yamllint

Class LintStreamReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.yaml.snakeyaml.reader.StreamReader
      • com.github.sbaudoin.yamllint.LintStreamReader

  • public class LintStreamReader
extends org.yaml.snakeyaml.reader.StreamReader
    StreamReader intended to replace SnakeYAML's standard class for loading the whole content in memory. This is not optimized but this is a requirement to permanently be able to have a complete access to the complete file content without windowing.

        public void forward(int length)
        read the next length characters and move the pointer. if the last character is high surrogate one more character will be read
        Overrides:
